text: Hey guys. Do you know if any guide/article that can help explain to me how multiple developers can work on a single project without overwriting each other's work (by accident)? We are using git for version control

You basically just said it. Use git to for version control.
To ensure that you don’t push the same code into the portal, use HS CLI and set up CI/CD for deployments.

HubSpot has a guide for CI/CD with GitHub actions: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/github-integration>

But it’s also possible in any other CI/CD

:this:

Also <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/creating-an-efficient-development-workflow|this is a good precursor doc> that explains using sandbox accounts for testing. Each developer can work on their branch independently without conflicts.
Has anyone built a theme with Node built in?
